tool_description: KeoCountries is an api to get list of countries, states, cities, with easy queries.
name: KeoCountries
title: KeoCountries

api_list.name: Cities
api_list.description: Get list of all cities in spesific state.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://keocountries.p.rapidapi.com/cities/102/1814"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "keocountries.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://keocountries.p.rapidapi.com/cities/{countryid}/{stateid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "keocountries.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
